42 /**
43  * @file test_bal.c
44  * @author foxBMS Team
45  * @date 2020-08-05 (date of creation)
46  * @updated 2023-02-03 (date of last update)
47  * @version v1.5.0

51  * @brief Test of the API of the balancing module
52  *
53  */

55 /*========== Includes =======================================================*/
56 #include "unity.h"
57 #include "Mockdatabase.h"
58 #include "Mockos.h"
59 
60 #include "database_cfg.h"
61 
62 #include "bal.h"
63 
64 #include <stdbool.h>
65 #include <stdio.h>
66 
67 /*========== Definitions and Implementations for Unit Test ==================*/
68 BAL_STATE_s initState;
69 
70 /*========== Setup and Teardown =============================================*/
71 void setUp(void) {
72  initState.timer = 0;
73  initState.stateRequest = BAL_STATE_NO_REQUEST;
74  initState.lastState = BAL_STATEMACH_UNINITIALIZED;
75  initState.state = BAL_STATEMACH_UNINITIALIZED;
76  initState.lastSubstate = BAL_ENTRY;
77  initState.substate = BAL_ENTRY;
78  initState.triggerEntry = 0;
79  initState.errorRequestCounter = 0;
80  initState.initializationFinished = STD_NOT_OK;
81  initState.active = false;
82  initState.balancingThreshold = 0;
83  initState.balancingAllowed = false;
84  initState.balancingGlobalAllowed = false;
85 }
86 
87 void tearDown(void) {
88 }
89 
90 /*========== Test Cases =====================================================*/
91 void testNoStateChanged(void) {
92  BAL_SaveLastStates(&initState);
93  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.lastState, BAL_STATEMACH_UNINITIALIZED);
94  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.state, BAL_STATEMACH_UNINITIALIZED);
95  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.lastSubstate, BAL_ENTRY);
96  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.substate, BAL_ENTRY);
97 }
98 
99 void testStateChanged(void) {
100  initState.lastState = BAL_STATEMACH_UNINITIALIZED;
101  initState.state = BAL_STATEMACH_INITIALIZATION;
102  BAL_SaveLastStates(&initState);
103  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.lastState, BAL_STATEMACH_INITIALIZATION);
104  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.state, BAL_STATEMACH_INITIALIZATION);
105  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.lastSubstate, BAL_ENTRY);
106  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.substate, BAL_ENTRY);
107 }
108 
109 void testSubstateChanged(void) {
110  initState.lastSubstate = BAL_ENTRY;
111  initState.substate = BAL_CHECK_IMBALANCES;
112  BAL_SaveLastStates(&initState);
113  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.lastState, BAL_STATEMACH_UNINITIALIZED);
114  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.state, BAL_STATEMACH_UNINITIALIZED);
115  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.lastSubstate, BAL_CHECK_IMBALANCES);
116  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.substate, BAL_CHECK_IMBALANCES);
117 }
118 
119 void testFiniteStateMachineCheckReEntranceFunction(void) {
120  OS_EnterTaskCritical_Expect();
121  OS_ExitTaskCritical_Expect();
122  uint8_t returnValue = 0;
123  returnValue = BAL_CheckReEntrance(&initState);
124  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(returnValue, 0);
125  OS_EnterTaskCritical_Expect();
126  OS_ExitTaskCritical_Expect();
127  returnValue = BAL_CheckReEntrance(&initState);
128  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(returnValue, 0xFF);
129 }
130 
131 void testFiniteStateMachineTransferStateRequestFunction(void) {
132  OS_EnterTaskCritical_Expect();
133  OS_ExitTaskCritical_Expect();
134  BAL_STATE_REQUEST_e returnValue = BAL_STATE_ERROR_REQUEST;
135  initState.stateRequest = BAL_STATE_ERROR_REQUEST;
136  returnValue = BAL_TransferStateRequest(&initState);
137  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(returnValue, BAL_STATE_ERROR_REQUEST);
138  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.stateRequest, BAL_STATE_NO_REQUEST);
139 }
140 
141 void testFiniteStateMachineCheckStateRequestFunction0(void) {
142  BAL_RETURN_TYPE_e returnValue = BAL_OK;
143 
144  returnValue = BAL_CheckStateRequest(&initState, BAL_STATE_ERROR_REQUEST);
145  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(returnValue, BAL_OK);
146 }
147 void testFiniteStateMachineCheckStateRequestFunction1(void) {
148  BAL_RETURN_TYPE_e returnValue = BAL_OK;
149  initState.balancingGlobalAllowed = false;
150  returnValue = BAL_CheckStateRequest(&initState, BAL_STATE_GLOBAL_ENABLE_REQUEST);
151  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.balancingGlobalAllowed, true);
152  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(returnValue, BAL_OK);
153 }
154 void testFiniteStateMachineCheckStateRequestFunction2(void) {
155  BAL_RETURN_TYPE_e returnValue = BAL_OK;
156  initState.balancingGlobalAllowed = true;
157  returnValue = BAL_CheckStateRequest(&initState, BAL_STATE_GLOBAL_DISABLE_REQUEST);
158  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.balancingGlobalAllowed, false);
159  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(returnValue, BAL_OK);
160 }
161 void testFiniteStateMachineCheckStateRequestFunction3(void) {
162  BAL_RETURN_TYPE_e returnValue = BAL_OK;
163  returnValue = BAL_CheckStateRequest(&initState, BAL_STATE_NO_BALANCING_REQUEST);
164  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(returnValue, BAL_OK);
165 }
166 void testFiniteStateMachineCheckStateRequestFunction4(void) {
167  BAL_RETURN_TYPE_e returnValue = BAL_OK;
168  returnValue = BAL_CheckStateRequest(&initState, BAL_STATE_ALLOWBALANCING_REQUEST);
169  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(returnValue, BAL_OK);
170 }
171 void testFiniteStateMachineCheckStateRequestFunction5(void) {
172  BAL_RETURN_TYPE_e returnValue = BAL_OK;
173  initState.state = BAL_STATEMACH_UNINITIALIZED;
174  returnValue = BAL_CheckStateRequest(&initState, BAL_STATE_INIT_REQUEST);
175  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(returnValue, BAL_OK);
176 }
177 
178 void testFiniteStateMachineCheckStateRequestFunction6(void) {
179  BAL_RETURN_TYPE_e returnValue = BAL_OK;
180  initState.state = BAL_STATEMACH_INITIALIZED;
181  returnValue = BAL_CheckStateRequest(&initState, BAL_STATE_INIT_REQUEST);
182  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(returnValue, BAL_ALREADY_INITIALIZED);
183 }
184 
185 void testFiniteStateMachineCheckStateRequestFunction7(void) {
186  /* illegal request */
187  BAL_RETURN_TYPE_e returnValue = BAL_OK;
188  initState.stateRequest = BAL_STATE_NO_REQUEST;
189  returnValue = BAL_CheckStateRequest(&initState, BAL_STATE_NO_REQUEST);
190  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(returnValue, BAL_ILLEGAL_REQUEST);
191 }
192 
193 void testProcessStateUninitalized0(void) {
194  BAL_ProcessStateUninitalized(&initState, BAL_STATE_INIT_REQUEST);
195  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.timer, BAL_STATEMACH_SHORTTIME_100ms);
196  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.state, BAL_STATEMACH_INITIALIZATION);
197  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.substate, BAL_ENTRY);
198 }
199 
200 void testProcessStateUninitalized1(void) {
201  BAL_ProcessStateUninitalized(&initState, BAL_STATE_NO_REQUEST);
202 }
203 
204 void testProcessStateUninitalized2(void) {
205  initState.errorRequestCounter = 0xFE;
206  BAL_ProcessStateUninitalized(&initState, BAL_STATE_ERROR_REQUEST);
207  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.errorRequestCounter, 0xFF);
208 }
209 
210 void testProcessStateInitialization(void) {
211  BAL_ProcessStateInitialization(&initState);
212  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.timer, BAL_STATEMACH_SHORTTIME_100ms);
213  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.state, BAL_STATEMACH_INITIALIZED);
214  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.substate, BAL_ENTRY);
215 }
216 
217 void testProcessStateInitialized(void) {
218  BAL_ProcessStateInitialized(&initState);
219  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.initializationFinished, STD_OK);
220  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.timer, BAL_STATEMACH_SHORTTIME_100ms);
221  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.state, BAL_STATEMACH_CHECK_BALANCING);
222  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(initState.substate, BAL_ENTRY);
223 }
